name: Pet Puzzle Match 3
description:
In this 3 match game there are various animals of forest. The cutest pets are ready for swap in this deluxe mania game. Swap 3 or more pets to solve the puzzle in Pet Puzzle Match 3.

Game Features:
• Enjoy amazing and deluxe boosters
• Switch and match pets and animals in this forest paradise
• Swap and match adorable pets

Enjoy deluxe match 3 game of pets in this forest adventure journey !
